column1: Requested output: years requested for each expt./output table combination (see CFMIP output sheet for information on time-periods for saving the special CFMIP-focused output.
column5: red font means output should be reported for only a single member in the case of an ensemble of simulations
blue font means this is a lower priority request

column1: If a cell is shaded yellow/tan,  none of the variables will  be part of the subset of model output that will be replicated at several locations (except, as noted by * or ** -- see note at right-- this may apply only to lower priority variables)
column5: "all*" indicates that although all years will be included in the "replicated" subset, only the high and medium priority variables will be included in the replicated subset.                                                                     "all**" indicates that although all years will be included in the "replicated" subset, only the highest priority variables will be included in the replicated subset
